1141765136492965888.text: Wait... Which entity is it that has a monopoly on the educational system?https://twitter.com/neiltyson/status/1111295662920888320 …

1141828150139215877.text: We just need to remove standardized testing and let students learn through a mastery style educational system that focuses on deep thinking and exploratory learning instead of just test prep

1141769946143318016.text: If we just put more money through the shredder that is public education then the flat earth theory would go away!

1142022838527954945.text: I am surprised I still get shocked when I see a lefty criticize a government function, but blame just the function for it's failing.

1142485869032615937.text: As I was leaving high school I could tell they were dumbing things down in the classes below us, privately some of our teachers lamented the same thing, that the grades coming up any more than a year or two behind us were not nearly as well prepared.

1141828502502748161.text: I mean, I'd just rather get government out of education all together. Or at the very least, eliminate the Dept. of Education and let localities determine the best means to educate their children.

1142053927543889920.text: That doesn’t always work out for the best. States and districts still have a good amount of autonomy, including the distribution of funds. Education standards vary greatly by state. The DoEd is just a waste of tax dollars.
